text: The Athletics competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The tournament was held from 23–30 November at the Heriberto Jara Corona Stadium. Detailed reports and an appraisal of the results were given. ==Medal summary== :For full event details see Athletics at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games – Results ===Men's events=== {| |-
